name: startup-research-agent
description: AI-powered startup research agent with web scraping and analysis

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.kill-backend: lsof -ti:5050 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No process found on port 5050'
scripts.kill-frontend: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null && lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No frontend processes found'
scripts.kill-all: npm run kill-backend && npm run kill-frontend
scripts.clean-start: npm run kill-all && npm run dev
scripts.clean-server: npm run kill-backend && npm run server
scripts.clean-frontend: npm run kill-frontend && npm run frontend
